inscription:
Inscription

ULC: (Dimly, Dimly / in the morning mist that lies over Akashi Bay, / my longings follow with the ship / that vanishes behind the distant isle)
medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
text: Poem by Hitomaro (fl. 8th century), number 409 in Kokin wakashū: "Dimly, dimly / in the morning mist that lies over Akashi Bay, / my longings follow with the ship / that vanishes behind the distant isle."
title: Kakinomoto no Hitomaro
